name: The Leyline Scenario
description:
WELCOME UNIT #04003

SCENARIO:

CITY LEYLINE OUTBREAK

GOAL:

REACH AND CLOSE ALL THE LEYLINES

THE EQUIPPED COMPASS WILL GUIDE YOU.

SPEED IS KEY

EXIT THE SPHERE TO BEGIN

========================================

SLAM HAND TO A SURFACE TO MOVE.

GRAB WHILE TOUCHING A SURFACE TO LOCK HAND TO THAT SURFACE.

RIGHT JOYSTICK TO TURN.

========================================

THIS IS WHAT A LEYLINE LOOKS LIKE.

ENTER THE BOTTOM OF ONE TO CLOSE IT.

ITS ENERGY WILL MAKE YOU STRONGER.

========================================

This is a VR game with controls inspired by the popular Gorilla Tag.

Thank you for checking out my game! Its simple, and the controls are very likely to be wonky, but I hope you can have fun (and not get sick). Made for the $2500 NYC GameJam hosted by GEOPIPE

All feedback is highly appreciated.

========================================

Assets Used:

Columbus Circle by GEOPIPE

COZY: Stylized Weather 2 by Distand Lands

Unity Atoms by Adam Ramberg
